sentence.Network_en: His words criticising modern society just right indicate his pontifical character.
sentence.Network_cn: 他用以批评现代社会的言论恰好反映了他自大武断的性格。

sentence.Network_en: Papal diplomats , all priests nowadays , are trained at the Pontifical Ecclesiastical Academy in Rome.
sentence.Network_cn: 如今教廷的外交官都是牧师, 都在罗马的圣座神职学院(PontificalEcclesiasticalAcademy)接受培训.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(P) ... pontiff 主教 pontifical 主教的 pontificate 教皇.
一些翻译~（转的~） ... pontiff 教皇 pontifical 教皇的 pope 教皇.
词根及词缀 ... sept 菌+ pontifical a 自以为是的 polemical a 引起争论的.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... veridical 说实话的 pontifical 自以为是的，武断的 tautological 冗赘的，用语重复的.

list.abs: the central meaning of his pontificate is to restore papal authority ( Conor Cruise O'Brien )他任职教皇的中心意图就是要恢复教皇权力(康纳·克鲁斯·奥布赖恩)
随后，纳斯尔在第五章对人的问题予以了关注。他区分了两种不同的人：一种是“通贯之人”（pontifical man），○12另一种是“普罗米修斯式的人”（Promethean man）。前者是指“通贯于天地之间或作为.
under John Paul Curia acquired a string of new " pontifical councils " , quasi-ministries that deal with everything from health workers to canon law .在约翰保罗时代教廷获得一系列新的“主教理事会”，准部委处理一切从卫生工作者到教会法的事务。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin pontificalis, from pontifex (see pontifex)

means.word_mean: 1. proceeding from or ordered by or subject to a pope or the papacy regarded as the successor of the Apostles;
2. denoting or governed by or relating to a bishop or bishops

stems_affixes.word_buile: geography地理[学]+ical……的→adj.地理学的,地理的
pontiff罗马教皇,主教+ical……的→pontifical像教皇一样自以为是的
symbol符号,记号,象征+ical……的→adj.表示象征的,符号的
tyranny暴政,苛政,专治+ical……的→tyrannical暴虐的,残暴的
